text:
During 1820's, at 12 year's old to 16 year's old, Alex Dupont invent a model of writing who permit to blind people to read. After a accident who let him at 100% blind, he was integrat in a school for blind with some scientists who tried to help him and creat some invention for blind to leave in society. When Alex Dupont dicoverd the model of writing create by the scientists, he think that he could be a better thinks because the original method was very difficult and memory needed. He creat the system with point in relief. He thinks at all, with some combination of 6 point, he creat 63 phonetic letters, some numbers, and the music note's. He presented is system at Charles Barbier De-La-Serre, the scientists who invented the precedent model of reading, and this scientists don't take care of him cause to his age. But the blind people in the institute dicoverd the Alex Dupont model of reading and they take care that's it's a very good model of reading and writing, and Alex Dupont model was imposed himself at blind people.
 Today, the model invented by Alex Dupont was at 90% the same, and it was extend for used in 130 countries. I don't think we can find a bad thinks who was created by the invention of Alex Dupont. Alex Dupont created a model who permit to thousands of blind people to read and write, permit to blind people to can be incorporate in society, was a figure for blind people who let them think that a blind people could be a genius, and permitte to scientists to let thinks that all thinks can be improved as same by a kid at 12 year's old.
